title: A Few More T206's For Sale

posts.post_title: A Few More T206's For Sale
posts.post_content: I have the following SGC T-206 cards for sale all prices are shipped either Paypal + 3%, Paypal money owed or money orders are fine also. I am selling roughly half of collection and will be posting others in small bunches soon. Thanks for looking. Dennis. Gremshaw SGC 30-Piedmont 350 $26 Mcintyre SGC 30- Piedmont 350-$29.
